customer_name: Four Rivers Kennel L L C
site_name: FOUR RIVERS KENNEL, L L C

citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on19-Jan-17 at 12:45 pm.
According to an employee, both the owner and the manager were going to be gone for the rest of the day.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on19-Jan-17 at 12:45 pm.
According to an employee, both the owner and the manager were going to be gone for the rest of the day.
